action.action-desc: Mr. Khanna (for himself, Mr. Chabot, Ms. Titus, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Connolly, Ms. Salazar, and Mr. Levin of Michigan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Foreign Service Act of 1980 to revise the terminology used to prohibit discrimination against people with disabilities serving in the Foreign Service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Dignity for People with Disabilities in the Foreign Service Act.

section.header: Dignity for people with disabilities serving in the Foreign Service
section.text: The Foreign Service Act of 1980 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2) of section 101(b) (22 U.S.C. 3901(b)), by striking handicapping condition and inserting disability;
in section 105 (22 U.S.C. 3905), by striking handicapping condition each place it appears and inserting disability;
in subparagraph (A) of section 1002(11) (22 U.S.C. 4102(11)), by striking handicapping condition and inserting disability; and
in paragraph (4) of section 1015(b) (22 U.S.C. 4115(b)), by striking handicapping condition and inserting disability.
